p: The LLC-MK2 cell line was established in 1955 from rhesus macaque ( Macaca mulatta) kidney epithelial cells ( 61). It has been mainly used in the study of poliovirus, but also to study SARS-CoV, HCoV-NL63 ( 34, 62, 63), and SARS-CoV-2 to assess the cytopathic effects in patients infected with the virus ( 41, 43) and to characterize its viral infectious pathway ( 39).
